thread.title: Jon Stewart Reveals President Trump’s Next Executive Orders
thread.title_full: Jon Stewart Reveals President Trump’s Next Executive Orders

title: Jon Stewart Reveals President Trump’s Next Executive Orders
text: Superfan TV • February 1, 2017 Jon Stewart stopped by The Late Show With Stephen Colbert to visit his old buddy and reveal President Trump’s next executive orders. Jon came out with a ridiculously long tie and a dead animal on his head. When Stephen asked him why he was wearing those things, Jon said, “The president sets men’s fashion, and I saw the inauguration… super-long tie, dead animal on head, boom!” Although, Jon wasn’t just there to show off his new fashion choices, he also claimed that he had the next executive orders that President Trump was preparing to sign. The first one Jon read was, “I, Donald J. Jonah Jameson Trump, hereby direct that, to secure our border, China shall immediately, and without hesitation, send us their wall. Done!” Jon went on a read a few more orders, and by the end of it he was exhausted. Jon said, “The presidency is supposed to age the president, not the public!” The Late Show With Stephen Colbert airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. on CBS. Watch: Leslie Mann, Stephen Colbert Give Nation Pep Talk About Trump Tell us what you think! Hit us up on Twitter , Facebook , or Instagram , or leave your comments below. And check out our host, Cynthia LuCiette, on Twitter , Facebook , or Instagram .
